name: moonrocks and satellites - stacking rings in sterling silver and rose gold
description: A pair of delicate stacking rings in sterling silver and red (rose) gold. One little moonrock with an orbiting 9 carat gold satellite, both on delicate bands. The silver is oxidised, then the surface of the moonrock is polished back to bright, leaving the craters contrasting. The bands are left black and buffed to shininess, like coal. Very pretty and delicate - the set pictured in the picture below is my own in a size 6 (I have big hands ;) I make these to order in your size - let me know on purchase what size you would like. They will take up to 3-4 days to make for you depending on how busy I am. All metal is sterling silver or 9 carat gold; all solder is hallmark quality. *********************** All my jewellery is thoroughly cleaned after polishing. It is also guaranteed - I will refund, remake or replace it in the unlikely event that it is flawed. I'm also happy to mend anything you manage to break for a nominal charge. ***********************

name: crow - black silver and red gold necklace
description: Deceptively simple and very striking, the centrepiece of this necklace is an asymmetric hammered bar of sterling silver, oxidised and polished to shiny black, with a perfect, shining round sphere of 9 carat red (rose) gold to one side. The back of the bar is roughly brushed. It hangs from doubled strands of oxidised silver chain - you can have this to a length of your choice; let me know on purchase and I will finish it with a sterling bolt catch. The second photo down is much wider and shows the full piece when viewed properly. The piece is blogged here: http://duckduckgoosestuff.co.uk/duckduckBLOG/?p=37 All metal used is sterling silver and 9 carat red gold; all solder is hallmark quality. *********************** All my jewellery is thoroughly cleaned after polishing. It is also guaranteed - I will refund, remake or replace it in the unlikely event that it is flawed. I'm also happy to mend anything you manage to break for a nominal charge. ***********************

name: dimpled in aqua - simpled silver studs with fused glass pools
description:
Tiny, individually formed sterling silver stud earrings with a little dimple. Very slightly irregular with a lovely organic feel, these look wonderful on - the fact that they are all unique little shapes means they look fantastic in a row. There are tiny heat-formed crevices with some black left in them, with the surface having a lovely glossy shine.

Fused into the dimples are tiny pools of aqua glass.

Size - 3-4 mm across.

Each pair is unique.

If you prefer another colour, convo me - I may be able to help, depending on the glass I have in.

I also sell plain versions of these as a set of three pairs (or six) if you want them for multiple piercings

Supplied with sterling silver backs (earnuts)

No solder has been used.


***********************

All my jewellery is thoroughly cleaned after polishing. It is also guaranteed - I will refund, remake or replace it in the unlikely event that it is flawed. I'm also happy to mend anything you manage to break for a nominal charge.


***********************

name: moonrocks - three stacking rings made to order in your size...
description: The title says it all ;) Odd, ancient, mysterious and alien. Little sterling silver pebbles, cratered with black pools come on three delicate silver bands. Fantastic worn together, fantastic worn alone. These are made to order and each set (each ring!) will be as individual, as unique as your fingerprints. Each pebble is different (as you can see from this set), so no matter how many sets are made, each will be one of a kind (or, come to think of it, three of a kind). The silver in the focal pebbles is "green" - recycled scrap. Name your size! This set is made to order, please allow a few days for it to be made. If you need it urgently - please convo me before purchase. Thes can have a satin or glossy finish - let me know which you prefer. All metal is fine or sterling silver; all solder is hallmark quality. ********************* All my jewellery is thoroughly cleaned after polishing. It is also guaranteed - I will refund, remake or replace it in the unlikely event that it is flawed. I'm also happy to mend anything you manage to break for a nominal charge. ***********************
